issues.description: CORS configuration may be missing or inadequate
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Make cross-origin requests to API
2. Check CORS headers
issues.observedOutput: CORS may not be properly configured
issues.expectedOutput: Should configure CORS appropriately for security

issues.description: Database connection may not enforce SSL/TLS
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Check database connection security
2. Monitor for unencrypted connections
issues.observedOutput: Database connections may be unencrypted
issues.expectedOutput: Should enforce SSL/TLS for database connections in production

issues.description: Sensitive data may be logged in console output
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Review server logs
2. Check for sensitive data exposure
issues.observedOutput: Sensitive information may be visible in logs
issues.expectedOutput: Should avoid logging sensitive data or redact it properly

issues.description: Session cookies may lack SameSite protection
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Test for CSRF attacks
2. Check cookie SameSite settings
issues.observedOutput: Session cookies may be vulnerable to CSRF attacks
issues.expectedOutput: Should configure SameSite attribute for session cookies

issues.description: Authentication endpoints may lack brute force protection
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Make multiple failed login attempts rapidly
2. Check if requests are limited
issues.observedOutput: Unlimited login attempts allowed
issues.expectedOutput: Should implement rate limiting on authentication endpoints

issues.description: Missing retry logic for OpenAI API calls
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Cause OpenAI API rate limit to trigger
2. Check if retries occur
issues.observedOutput: API calls may fail permanently on transient errors
issues.expectedOutput: Should implement exponential backoff retry logic for resilience

issues.description: User input to OpenAI may lack proper sanitization
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Send prompt injection attempts
2. Check if malicious prompts are filtered
issues.observedOutput: Malicious prompts may be sent directly to OpenAI
issues.expectedOutput: Should sanitize and validate user input before sending to OpenAI

issues.description: OpenAI API calls may lack timeout configuration
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Test with slow OpenAI responses
2. Check if requests timeout appropriately
issues.observedOutput: Long-running OpenAI requests may hang indefinitely
issues.expectedOutput: Should configure appropriate timeouts for OpenAI API calls

issues.description: OpenAI model parameter may not be validated
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Send invalid model name to OpenAI functions
2. Check error handling
issues.observedOutput: Invalid model names may cause API errors
issues.expectedOutput: Should validate model names before making API calls

issues.description: Mixed BigInt and Number operations may cause precision errors
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Perform calculations with large credit amounts
2. Check for precision loss
issues.observedOutput: Credit calculations may lose precision or fail
issues.expectedOutput: Should use consistent numeric types throughout billing calculations

issues.description: Async database operations may lack comprehensive error handling
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Cause database constraint violation
2. Check error handling behavior
issues.observedOutput: Database errors may cause unhandled promise rejections
issues.expectedOutput: Should wrap async database operations in try-catch blocks

issues.description: Missing error boundary for React error handling
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Cause a React component error
2. Check if error is caught gracefully
issues.observedOutput: Uncaught React errors may crash the entire application
issues.expectedOutput: Should implement error boundary to catch and handle React errors

issues.description: React StrictMode not enabled for development
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Run app in development mode
2. Check for React warnings
issues.observedOutput: React development warnings may not appear
issues.expectedOutput: Should enable React.StrictMode for better development experience

issues.description: useEffect #1 may have missing or incorrect dependencies
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Use React DevTools
2. Check for useEffect warnings in console
issues.observedOutput: May have stale closures or infinite re-renders
issues.expectedOutput: Should include all dependencies in useEffect dependency array

1. Submit forms with various invalid data
2. Check if validation occurs
issues.observedOutput: Invalid form data may be submitted without client-side validation
issues.expectedOutput: Should implement client-side validation using schemas (e.g., Zod)

issues.description: Input fields may lack HTML5 validation attributes
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Enter invalid data in input fields
2. Check browser validation
issues.observedOutput: Browser-native validation may be missing
issues.expectedOutput: Should use HTML5 validation attributes for better UX

issues.description: Authentication hook may lack token expiration handling
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Wait for authentication token to expire
2. Try authenticated requests
issues.observedOutput: Expired tokens may cause authentication errors
issues.expectedOutput: Should handle token expiration with automatic refresh or re-authentication

issues.description: API client may lack comprehensive error handling
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Make API calls with network disconnected
2. Check error handling
issues.observedOutput: Network errors may cause unhandled promise rejections
issues.expectedOutput: Should implement comprehensive error handling in API client

issues.description: API client may lack request/response interceptors for common handling
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Make authenticated API calls
2. Check token handling consistency
issues.observedOutput: Authentication tokens may not be consistently handled
issues.expectedOutput: Should implement request interceptors for consistent token handling

issues.description: API client may lack request timeout configuration
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Make API calls to slow endpoints
2. Check if requests timeout
issues.observedOutput: Slow API calls may hang indefinitely
issues.expectedOutput: Should configure appropriate timeouts for API requests

issues.description: Utility functions may lack input validation
issues.stepsToReproduce:
1. Call utility functions with invalid inputs
2. Check error handling
issues.observedOutput: Invalid inputs may cause utility functions to fail
issues.expectedOutput: Should validate inputs in utility functions for robustness

issues.description: Utility functions may lack input validation
issues.stepsToReproduce:

issues.observedOutput: Invalid inputs may cause utility functions to fail
issues.expectedOutput: Should validate inputs in utility functions for robustness

Security: Implement comprehensive input validation and sanitization
Add proper authentication and authorization checks
Implement rate limiting on sensitive endpoints
Error Handling: Add comprehensive try-catch blocks for async operations
Implement proper error boundaries in React components
Log errors appropriately without exposing sensitive data
Performance: Implement database query optimization and indexing
Add caching strategies for expensive operations
Implement pagination for large data sets
Reliability: Add database transaction handling for consistency
Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
Add timeout configuration for external services
